calculateTangentSpace.description: Calculates the tangents and bitangents for the imported meshes.
calculateTangentSpace.name: Calculate Tangent Space

designStudioWorkarounds.description: Enable options that are needed to create Design Studio compatible components.
designStudioWorkarounds.name: Design Studio Compatibility Mode

dropNormals.description: Drops normals for all faces of all meshes.
dropNormals.name: Drop Normals

expandValueComponents.description: When enabled value types like vector3d and quaternion will be expanded.
expandValueComponents.name: Expand value components

fbxPreservePivots.description: Set whether the fbx importer will preserve pivot points (as extra nodes)
fbxPreservePivots.name: FBX: Preserve Pivot Points

findDegenerates.description: This step searches all meshes for degenerate primitives and converts them to proper lines or points.
findDegenerates.name: Find Degenerates

findInstances.description: This step searches for duplicate meshes and replaces them with references to the first mesh.
findInstances.name: Find Instances

findInvalidData.description: This step searches all meshes for invalid data, such as zeroed normal vectors or invalid UV coords and removes/fixes them. This is intended to get rid of some common exporter errors.
findInvalidData.name: Find Invalid Data

fixInfacingNormals.description: Tries to determine which meshes have normal vectors that are facing inwards and inverts them.
fixInfacingNormals.name: Fix Infacing Normals

generateLightmapUV.description: Unwrap mesh to generate lightmap UV channel
generateLightmapUV.name: Generate Lightmap UVs

generateMeshLevelsOfDetail.description: When possible, create mesh Levels of Detail by automatically simplifying the source mesh
generateMeshLevelsOfDetail.name: Generate Mesh Levels of Detail

generateMipMaps.description: Force all imported texture components to generate mip maps for mip map texture filtering
generateMipMaps.name: Generate Mip Maps

generateNormals.description: Generates normals for all faces of all meshes
generateNormals.name: Generate Normals

generateSmoothNormals.description: Generates smooth normals for all vertices in the mesh.
generateSmoothNormals.name: Generate Smooth Normals

globalScale.description: This step will perform a global scale of the model.
globalScale.name: Enable Global Scale

improveCacheLocality.description: Reorders triangles for better vertex cache locality.
improveCacheLocality.name: Improve Cache Locality

joinIdenticalVertices.description: Identifies and joins identical vertex data sets within all imported meshes.
joinIdenticalVertices.name: Join Identical Vertices

lightmapBaseResolution.description: Approx. size (width and height) which lightmap images should target.
lightmapBaseResolution.name: Lightmap Base Resolution

optimizeGraph.description: A postprocessing step to optimize the scene hierarchy.
optimizeGraph.name: Optimize Graph

optimizeMeshes.description: A postprocessing step to reduce the number of meshes.
optimizeMeshes.name: Optimize Meshes

preTransformVertices.description: Removes the node graph and pre-transforms all vertices with the local transformation matrices of their nodes.
preTransformVertices.name: Pre-transform Vertices

recalculateLodNormals.description: Calculate new normals when necessary for Generated Mesh Levels of detail
recalculateLodNormals.name: Recalculate Normals for Generated Mesh LODs

recalculateLodNormalsMergeAngle.description: Maximum angle in degrees to consider for normal smoothing/merging
recalculateLodNormalsMergeAngle.name: Merge Angle for Mesh LODs

recalculateLodNormalsSplitAngle.description: Maximum angle in degrees to consider for normal spliting, which creates new vertex data
recalculateLodNormalsSplitAngle.name: Split Angle for Mesh LODs

removeComponentAnimations.description: Removes any animation components from meshes.
removeComponentAnimations.name: Remove Animation Components

removeComponentBoneWeights.description: Removes any bone weights from meshes.
removeComponentBoneWeights.name: Remove Bone Weight components

removeComponentColors.description: Removes any Color components from meshes.
removeComponentColors.name: Remove Color Components

removeComponentTangentsAndBitangents.description: Removes Tangents and Bitangents components from meshes.
removeComponentTangentsAndBitangents.name: Remove Tangent Components

removeComponentTextures.description: Removes any embedded texture components from meshes.
removeComponentTextures.name: Remove Texture Components

removeComponentUVs.description: Removes any UV components from meshes.
removeComponentUVs.name: Remove UV Components

removeRedundantMaterials.description: Searches for redundant/unreferenced materials and removes them.
removeRedundantMaterials.name: Remove Redundant Materials

splitLargeMeshes.description: Splits large meshes into smaller sub-meshes.
splitLargeMeshes.name: Split Large Meshes

transformUVCoordinates.description: This step applies per-texture UV transformations and bakes them into stand-alone vtexture coordinate channels.
transformUVCoordinates.name: Transform UV Coordinates

useBinaryKeyframes.description: Record keyframe data as binary files
useBinaryKeyframes.name: Use Binary Keyframes

useFloatJointIndices.description: Stores joint indices as floating point numbers for GLES 2.0.
useFloatJointIndices.name: Use Float Joint Indices
